## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Present architectural decisions effectively
2. Articulate trade-offs in technical choices
3. Receive and incorporate feedback
4. Refactor code based on architectural principles

## Deliverables

::: {.callout-important}
**Midterm Project Presentation:** Tuesday, February 24
:::

## Presentation Guidelines

Each team will present:

- Current system architecture
- Key technical decisions and trade-offs (2-3 ADRs)
- Demo of working features
- Challenges and lessons learned
- Next steps

**Time:** 10-15 minutes per team + 5 minutes Q&A

## Evaluation Criteria

| Criteria | Weight |
|----------|--------|
| Architecture Understanding | 30% |
| Decision Quality (ADRs) | 25% |
| Implementation | 20% |
| Presentation Quality | 15% |
| Q&A Response | 10% |
